name: raggedly
content:
raggedly adverb
(CLOTHES)
Add to word list
Add to word list
wearing clothes that are torn and not in good condition: She did not notice the raggedly dressed woman who was crossing the road towards her.
More examplesFewer examplesHis coat fell raggedly about his ankles.The men were raggedly clothed in dirty uniforms.Several raggedly clad village children run after the car.
